statement: The README should emphasize the single public API surface (`packages/engine/src/index.ts`) and show how Lab and Analysis consume it (typed Convex API + export bundles), reinforcing the clean integration boundaries after the refactor.
rationale: Engine index re-exports models and generated API; Lab and Analysis import these to drive workflows and data pulls.
keyAssumptions: Clear public API boundaries reduce confusion for new contributors.
validationCriteria: README includes a section on public exports and mentions downstream consumers (Lab, Analysis).
critiquePoints: Too much emphasis on internal imports might distract from user-focused getting-started sections.
questions: Should README include a short code snippet showing `@judge-gym/engine` usage?
